column4: hello can anyone help me with IceWm? I need to start icewmbg before i start icewm. but i don't know how to make this happen. thanks
i usually login and see the ubuntu log in sign - so i type my username then password then it's already inside icewm.
is icewm not an option in gdm / kdm?
you need to ad the line in startsimple.sh before the icewm line
thanks, i was sort of reading your previous sentence 5 times now lol
its how i give back for a free OS
I wish I could contribute something too, but I am no good at these stuff
you'll learn and youmay even help me one day
no one user knows everything but together all the users can solve any issue
i like this ubuntu community thing, pretty awesome
windows has it a little bit too but not so much
i beg to differ - in windows you have to PAY for these things
but i dont use windows anymore ;) ubuntu rocks!
i dont use my system much so i just chat and browse which ubuntu can do just fine
